metadata.name: JEREMYVILLE X BE@RBRICK 400% - #1 of 33
metadata.description: This non-fungible token (“NFT”) represents a tender of Jeremyville x Be@rbrick 400% (“Unit”), Unit as produced by Medicom Toy & CG+ and NFT as verified by HANDSOFF. The holder of this NFT is hereby acknowledged by HANDSOFF (the original vendor of this Unit) as the rightful owner of the Unit. Any person, in lawful receipt of this Unit or NFT, shall be entitled to receive the other; and, this Unit is deemed transferred or sold to another upon the lawful receipt of this NFT.
